NN ` defined on ` S ` and ` G ` is a function on ` S ` , and for every ` 0 < x ` there is a ` j ` such that the functions ` F ( k ) ` for ` j <_ k ` are all uniformly within ` x ` of ` G ` on the domain ` S ` . Compare with ~ df-clim . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: ulmcl
blocks.content: Closure of a uniform limit of functions. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ulmcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {

blocks.name: ulmshft
blocks.content: A sequence of functions converges iff the shifted sequence converges. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)

thm ulmshft(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wbr(c3, cfv(culm, c1), c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cuz, c5))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cuz, co(c5, caddc, c7)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, co(cc, cmap, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c6, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  impbid(w0, wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), c2), wbr(c3, cfv(culm, c1), c2))
  ulmshftlem(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, w0)
  ulmshftlem(hs0, c3, c1, c2, c0, c6, co(c5, caddc, c7), cfv(cuz, co(co(c5, caddc, c7), caddc, cneg(c7))), cneg(c7), w0)
  eqid(cfv(cuz, co(co(c5, caddc, c7), caddc, cneg(c7))))
  zaddcld(c5, c7, w0)
  fmpt3d(s0, c3, c6, co(cc, cmap, c1), cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7)), w0)
  ffvelrnd(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7), co(cc, cmap, c1), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6), wf(c0, c4, co(cc, cmap, c1)))
  syl6eleqr(co(cv(s0), cmin, c7), c4, cfv(cuz, c5), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmin, c7), cfv(cuz, c5)), wcel(c5, cz), wcel(c7, cz), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c5, caddc, c7))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6), wcel(c5, cz))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6), wcel(c7, cz))
  syl6eleq(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c5, caddc, c7)), c6, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6))
  eluzsub(c5, c7, cv(s0))
  3eqtr4rd(c0, cmpt(hs0, cfv(cuz, co(co(c5, caddc, c7), caddc, cneg(c7))), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cneg(c7)))), cmpt(hs0, c4, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cneg(c7)))), cmpt(hs0, c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(hs0, c4, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cneg(c7))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), w0)
  3eqtrd(cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cneg(c7))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c6, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7))), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  fveq2d(c3, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cneg(c7)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  subnegd(cv(hs0), c7, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  fveq1d(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), cmpt(s0, c6, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c6, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7)))))
  eqtrd(cfv(cmpt(s0, c6, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7))), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), cmin, c7)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c6, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7))), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7)), cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), cmin, c7))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), c6))

  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), cfv(cuz, co(c5, caddc, c7))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c5)), wcel(c7, cz))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(c7, cz))
  eluzadd(cv(hs0), c5, c7)
  fvmpt(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), c6, cmpt(s0, c6, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7))), cfv(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), cmin, c7)), cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7)))
  fvoveq1(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), c0, cmin, c7)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c6, cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), cmin, c7))))
  fvex(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), cmin, c7))
  fveq2d(c0, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), cmin, c7), cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  pncand(cv(hs0), c7, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  zcnd(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c5)))
  syl6eleq(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c5), c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  eluzelz(cv(hs0), c5)
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(c7, cc))
  mpteq1d(hs0, cfv(cuz, co(co(c5, caddc, c7), caddc, cneg(c7))), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), cmin, cneg(c7))), c4, w0)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cuz, co(co(c5, caddc, c7), caddc, cneg(c7))), c4, cfv(cuz, c5), w0)
  fveq2d(cuz, co(co(c5, caddc, c7), caddc, cneg(c7)), c5, w0)
  3eqtrd(co(co(c5, caddc, c7), caddc, cneg(c7)), c5, co(c5, caddc, co(c7, caddc, cneg(c7))), co(c5, caddc, nat0), w0)
  addassd(c5, c7, cneg(c7), w0)
  zcnd(cneg(c7), w0)
  znegcld(c7, w0)
  oveq2d(c5, caddc, co(c7, caddc, cneg(c7)), nat0, w0)
  negidd(c7, w0)
  zcnd(c7, w0)
  addid1d(c5, w0)
  zcnd(c5, w0)
  feqmptd(hs0, c0, c4, co(cc, cmap, c1), w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, co(co(c5, caddc, c7), caddc, cneg(c7))))
  diff.hs0.c(cneg(c7))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cc, cmap, c1)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.cmap.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), cmin, c7))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, c7), cmin, c7)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, c7)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

blocks.name: ulmdm
blocks.content: Two ways to express that a function has a limit. (The expression ` ( ( ~~>u `` S ) `` F ) ` is sometimes useful as a shorthand for "the unique limit of the function ` F ` "). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm ulmdm(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cfv(culm, c1))), wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), cfv(cfv(culm, c1), c0)))
} = {
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cdm(cfv(culm, c1))), wbr(c0, cfv(culm, c1), cfv(cfv(culm, c1), c0))), wfun(cfv(culm, c1)))
  mpbir2an(wfun(cfv(culm, c1)), wrel(cfv(culm, c1)), wal(hs0, wal(hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(culm, c1), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(culm, c1), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))))
  ulmrel(c1)
  gen2(hs0, hs1, wal(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(culm, c1), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(culm, c1), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  ax-gen(hs2, wi(wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(culm, c1), cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cfv(culm, c1), cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  ulmuni(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  dffun2(hs0, hs1, hs2, cfv(culm, c1))
  funfvbrb(cfv(culm, c1), c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(culm, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(culm, c1))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(culm, c1))
}

blocks.name: ulmcau
blocks.content: A sequence of functions converges uniformly iff it is uniformly Cauchy, which is to say that for every ` 0 < x ` there is a ` j ` such that for all ` j <_ k ` the functions ` F ( k ) ` and ` F ( j ) ` are uniformly within ` x ` of each other on ` S ` . This is the four-quantifier version, see ~ ulmcau2 for the more conventional five-quantifier version. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c4))

  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)

  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  impbid(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cfv(culm, c1))), wral(s0, crp, wrex(s1, c2, wral(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wral(s3, c1, wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cfv(c0, cv(s2)), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), cv(s3)))), clt, cv(s0)))))))

blocks.name: ulmcau2
blocks.content: A sequence of functions converges uniformly iff it is uniformly Cauchy, which is to say that for every ` 0 < x ` there is a ` j ` such that for all ` j <_ k , m ` the functions ` F ( k ) ` and ` F ( m ) ` are uniformly within ` x ` of each other on ` S ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ulmbdd
blocks.content: A uniform limit of bounded functions is bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2015.)

blocks.content: A uniform limit of continuous functions is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2015.)

blocks.name: ulmdv
blocks.content: If ` F ` is a sequence of differentiable functions on ` X ` which converge pointwise to ` G ` , and the derivatives of ` F ( n ) ` converge uniformly to ` H ` , then ` G ` is differentiable with derivative ` H ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ulmdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cdv, c1), c2))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c5, c3, co(cc, cmap, c6)))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6)), wbr(cmpt(s1, c3, cfv(cfv(c5, cv(s1)), cv(s0))), cli, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cmpt(s1, c3, co(c0, cdv, cfv(c5, cv(s1)))), cfv(culm, c6), c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqfnfvd(s0, co(c0, cdv, c1), c2, c6, w0)
  ffnd(co(c0, cdv, c1), c6, cc, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wf(co(c0, cdv, c1), c6, cc), wf(co(c0, cdv, c1), cdm(co(c0, cdv, c1)), cc))
  feq2d(co(c0, cdv, c1), cdm(co(c0, cdv, c1)), cc, c6, w0)
  eqelssd(s0, cdm(co(c0, cdv, c1)), c6, w0)

  syl(w0, wss(c0, cc), wcel(c0, cpr(cr, cc)))

  rspcdva(s1, c4, c3, w0, wss(c6, c0), wss(c6, c0))

  ulmdvlem2(s1, s0, c3, c0, c5, c6, c4, c1, c2, w0)
  dvbsss(c0, cfv(c5, cv(s1)))
  syl6eleqr(c4, c3, cfv(cuz, c4), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cuz, c4)), wcel(c4, cz))
  uzid(c4)
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c6)), wcel(cv(s0), cdm(co(c0, cdv, c1))), wbr(cv(s0), co(c0, cdv, c1), cfv(c2, cv(s0))))

thm ulmdv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  โข (w0 โ(c0[_D]c1)= c2)
  โฃ c3 =(โคโฅ ` c4)
  โฃ (w0 โ c0 โ { โ, โ })
  โฃ (w0 โ c4 โ โค)
  โฃ (w0 โ(c5 : c3 โ(โ[โฆ]c6)))
  โฃ (w0 โ(c1 : c6 โ โ))
  โฃ ((w0 โง s0 โ c6)โ(s1 โ c3 โฆ((c5 ` s1)` s0))[~~>](c1 ` s0))
  โฃ (w0 โ(s1 โ c3 โฆ(c0[_D](c5 ` s1)))[(~~>u ` c6)]c2)
  โฃ d(s0, s1)

  โฃ d(s1, c5)
  โฃ d(s1, c6)
  โฃ d(s0, w0)
  โฃ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqfnfvd(s0, (c0[_D]c1), c2, c6, w0)
  ffnd((c0[_D]c1), c6, cc, w0)
  mpbid(w0, ((c0[_D]c1): c6 โ โ), ((c0[_D]c1): dom((c0[_D]c1))โ โ))

  eqelssd(s0, dom((c0[_D]c1)), c6, w0)
  dvbss(c0, c1, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 โ โ, c0 โ { โ, โ })
  recnprss(c0)
  rspcdva(s1, c4, c3, w0, c6 โ c0, c6 โ c0)
  biidd(s1 = c4, c6 โ c0)
  ralrimiva(s1, c3, w0, c6 โ c0)
  syl6eqssr(c6, c0, dom((c0[_D](c5 ` s1))), (w0 โง s1 โ c3))
  ulmdvlem2(s1, s0, c3, c0, c5, c6, c4, c1, c2, w0)
  dvbsss(c0, (c5 ` s1))
  syl6eleqr(c4, c3, (โคโฅ ` c4), w0)
  syl(w0, c4 โ(โคโฅ ` c4), c4 โ โค)
  uzid(c4)
  syl((w0 โง s0 โ c6), s0 โ dom((c0[_D]c1)), s0[(c0[_D]c1)](c2 ` s0))
  breldm(s0, (c0[_D]c1), (c2 ` s0))

  syl(w0, (c2 : c6 โ โ), (s1 โ c3 โฆ(c0[_D](c5 ` s1)))[(~~>u ` c6)]c2)
  ulmcl((s1 โ c3 โฆ(c0[_D](c5 ` s1))), c6, c2)
  sylc((w0 โง s0 โ c6), ((c0[_D]c1)` s0)=(c2 ` s0), Fun((c0[_D]c1)), s0[(c0[_D]c1)](c2 ` s0))
  adantr(w0, s0 โ c6, Fun((c0[_D]c1)))

blocks.name: mtest
blocks.content: The Weierstrass M-test. If ` F ` is a sequence of functions which are uniformly bounded by the convergent sequence ` M ( k ) ` , then the series generated by the sequence ` F ` converges uniformly. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: mtestbdd
blocks.content: Given the hypotheses of the Weierstrass M-test, the convergent function of the sequence is uniformly bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm mtestbdd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c1, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c5, c2, co(cc, cmap, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s2)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(cfv(c5, cv(s2)), cv(s1))), cle, cfv(c6, cv(s2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cseq(c3, caddc, c6), cdm(cli)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cseq(c3, cof(caddc), c5), cfv(culm, c0), c1))

blocks.name: mbfulm
blocks.content: A uniform limit of measurable functions is measurable. (This is just a corollary of the fact that a pointwise limit of measurable functions is measurable, see ~ mbflim .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mbfulm(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmbf))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cz))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c3, c1, cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c3, cfv(culm, c4), c0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(c0, cmbf, cmpt(hs0, c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), w0)
  feqmptd(hs0, c0, c4, cc, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(c0, c4, cc), wbr(c3, cfv(culm, c4), c0))
  ulmcl(c3, c4, c0)
  mbflim(hs0, hs1, c4, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c1, c2, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), cc, w0)
  ulmclm(hs2, cmpt(hs1, c1, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), c0, cv(hs0), c1, c2, c3, c4, universe, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(c2, cz))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wf(c3, c1, co(cc, cmap, c4)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  a1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cmpt(hs1, c1, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), universe))
  mptex(hs1, c1, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  fvexi(c1, cuz, c2)
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)), wcel(cv(hs2), c1), wceq(cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(hs1, c1, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), cv(hs2))))
  eqcomd(cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(hs1, c1, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs2), c1))
  fvmpt(hs1, cv(hs2), c1, cmpt(hs1, c1, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)))
  fveq1d(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0), cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), c3)
  eqid(cmpt(hs1, c1, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  fvex(cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wbr(c3, cfv(culm, c4), c0))
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(hs0, c4, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))), cmbf, cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  feqmptd(hs0, cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), c4, cc, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs1), c1, c3, cmbf, w0)
  anasss(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c4), wcel(cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0)), cc))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), c4, cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cc, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c1)), wf(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), c4, cc), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), co(cc, cmap, c4)))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs1), c1, c3, co(cc, cmap, c4), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wf(c3, c1, co(cc, cmap, c4)), wfn(c3, c1), wbr(c3, cfv(culm, c4), c0))
  ffnd(c3, c1, cmbf, w0)
  ulmf2(c3, c1, c4, c0)
  elmapi(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cc, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.c(cmpt(hs1, c1, cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)), cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c4)))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs2))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cfv(c3, cv(hs2)), cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c3, cv(hs1)))
}

  โข (w0 โ c0 โ MblFn)
  โฃ c1 =(โคโฅ ` c2)
  โฃ (w0 โ c2 โ โค)

blocks.content: A uniform limit of integrable functions is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: itgulm
blocks.content: A uniform limit of integrals of integrable functions converges to the integral of the limit function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: itgulm2
blocks.content: A uniform limit of integrals of integrable functions converges to the integral of the limit function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Mar-2015.)
